34601.name: Honoured Tattoo of the Berserker
stats: You gain Onslaught for 4 seconds on Hit
reminderText: (Onslaught grants 20% increased Attack, Cast, and Movement Speed)

30691.name: Tattoo of the Tawhoa Shaman
stats: 2% of Damage taken Recouped as Life
reminderText: (Only Damage from Hits can be Recouped, over 4 seconds following the Hit)

26523.name: Tattoo of the Tukohama Warrior
stats: Melee Hits which Stun have 5% chance to Fortify
reminderText: (Fortifying grants an amount of Fortification based on the Damage of the Hit)
(Take 1% less Damage from Hits per Fortification. Maximum 20 Fortification. Fortification lasts 6 seconds)

50862.name: Tattoo of the Tukohama Warrior
stats: Melee Hits which Stun have 5% chance to Fortify
reminderText: (Fortifying grants an amount of Fortification based on the Damage of the Hit)
(Take 1% less Damage from Hits per Fortification. Maximum 20 Fortification. Fortification lasts 6 seconds)

15405.name: Tattoo of the Kitava Blood Drinker
stats: 0.5% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
reminderText: (Leeched Life is recovered over time. Multiple Leeches can occur simultaneously, up to a maximum rate)

11651.name: Loyalty Tattoo of Kiloava
stats: Trigger Summon Spirit of Kiloava Skill when you Block Damage from a Unique Enemy

21650.name: Solipsism
stats:
Intelligence provides no inherent bonus to Energy Shield
2% reduced Duration of Elemental Ailments on you per 15 Intelligence
reminderText: (Elemental Ailments are Ignited, Scorched, Chilled, Frozen, Brittle, Shocked, and Sapped)
flavourText: To know yourself is to understand existence - and understanding brings control.
